Appendix A.1.3 <config>

<config>
Namespace http://hcmc.uvic.ca/ns/staticSearch
Module ss
Contained by
—
May contain
ss: contexts params rules
Content model 
<content>
 <elementRef key="params"/>
 <elementRef key="rules" minOccurs="0"/>
 <elementRef key="contexts" minOccurs="0"/>
</content>
Schema Declaration 
element config { params, rules?, contexts? }

Appendix A.1.11 <params>

<params>
Namespace http://hcmc.uvic.ca/ns/staticSearch
Module ss
Contained by
ss: config
May contain
ss: baseDir collectionDir createContexts dictionaryFile indentJSON kwicTruncateString maxContexts outDir phrasalSearch recurse replacementsFile searchInputId searchPage stopwordsFile tempDir totalKwicLength verbose
Content model 
<content>
 <sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1">
  <elementRef key="baseDir"/>
  <elementRef key="collectionDir"/>
  <elementRef key="tempDir"/>
  <elementRef key="outDir"/>
  <elementRef key="recurse"/>
  <elementRef key="phrasalSearch"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="createContexts"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="maxContexts"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="totalKwicLength"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="kwicTruncateString"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="verbose" minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="stopwordsFile"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="dictionaryFile"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="replacementsFile"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="searchPage"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="searchInputId"
   minOccurs="0"/>
  <elementRef key="indentJSON"
   minOccurs="0"/>
 </sequence>
</content>
Schema Declaration 
element params
{
   baseDir,
   collectionDir,
   tempDir,
   outDir,
   recurse,
   phrasalSearch?,
   createContexts?,
   maxContexts?,
   totalKwicLength?,
   kwicTruncateString?,
   verbose?,
   stopwordsFile?,
   dictionaryFile?,
   replacementsFile?,
   searchPage?,
   searchInputId?,
   indentJSON?
}
